name: Skip A Beat (itch)
description:
Skip A Beat:
  • Theme: Keep it Alive
  • I took part in the JAM as a SOLO developer.

This was a really fun challenge to take part it. Because this was my first time taking part in a Ludum Dare 46 game jam I was really nervous and unsure when to start, but once I had my idea and a plan to follow everything became less stressful and more enjoyable.  At This point I would say that the hardest part of this challenge is number one  getting the idea. This was an issue for me not because I'm not creative or anything, in fact I had multiple ideas in mind; but my issue was choosing the perfect one. Then the only other obstacles that I faced was wanting to add more and more and more. The issue with this is that there was a time limit and I knew that I wouldn't be able to complete the wanted feature in time, which just became a disappointment throughout. However, I enjoyed the whole experience and recommend it to everyone to trey out. :)

This game was made for Ludum Dare 46!
  • My Submission: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/skip-a-beat
  • This is my first every Ludum Dare Entry :)
  • Hope you like it!
Controls:
  • Down Arrow: Move Down
  • Up Arrow: Move Up
Programs Used:
  • Unity - Programming Engine
  • Blender - 3D Modelling
  • Photoshop - All 2D Assets
  • Premier Pro - Cut-scenes
  •  Audacity - Audio
